alert.note: Alert for Campbell; Corson; McPherson (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Aberdeen (Northern and Northeastern South Dakota)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued February 20 at 1:41PM MST until February 21 at 5:00PM MST by NWS Aberdeen
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 6 PM CST /5 PM MST/ THIS EVENING TO 6 PM CST /5 PM MST/ MONDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 4 to 10 inches. The greatest snowfall amounts will occur along the North Dakota and South Dakota border, with lesser amounts along the southern parts of the counties. Winds gusting as high as 30 mph. * WHERE...Corson, Campbell and McPherson Counties. * WHEN...From 6 PM CST /5 PM MST/ this evening to 6 PM CST /5 PM MST/ Monday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions could impact the Monday morning commute. The dangerously cold wind chills as low as 40 below zero could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 10 minutes.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
